name: Ninja Darter Demo
description:
Heavily inspired by games like The Messenger, Ninja Darter is a simple game of slashing enemies and making it to the end goal. You'll be collecting hearts and coins along the way.

Since this is a demo, it is very primitive. I'm planning on expanding on the coin system by offering upgrades in exchange for coins.

Game-play wise, it is simple. You have a sword which you can use to attack, but also destroy enemy projectiles. Simply swing your sword at the precise moment! 

It is also "pseudo randomly" generated. The level will change every time you play!

This version of Ninja Darter is using assets I've found on itch.io and other sites, which I will begin to list here:
